review: "Game of Thrones - Das Lied von Eis und Feuer" is a captivating adaptation that brings George R. R. Martin's epic fantasy to life through stunning visuals and well-crafted panels. The comic format adds a new dimension to the intricate plot and dynamic characters, making it a must-read for fans of the series. Despite some minor pacing issues, it remains a thrilling journey into the world of Westeros.
